title: Love Hurts
description: Crystal Stephens is living the perfect life. She has everything she ever wanted except a man that will fulfill all her sexual wants and needs. She desires pain with her pleasure, and no one has come close to satisfying her. Now, sheâ€™s starting to give up hope of finding him.Jackson Barnes needs a fresh start. Back on the job after a leave of absence, his focus is on his new undercover assignment at the new club Pure Sin. He has sworn off love after his latest breakup until the perfect woman falls at his feet.
author: Thetta James
